chunks.zh: 今天有几个倒霉蛋已经开始上班了？
chunks.en: How many unlucky folks have already started working today?

chunks.zh: 年前提前一天放假，年后也提前一天上班
chunks.en: Taking one day off in advance before the New Year, and also starting work one day earlier after the New Year.

chunks.zh: 有工作就不错了，过年回老家，很多人都说失业了。
chunks.en: Having a job is already good, when returning to my hometown for the New Year, many people said they were unemployed.

chunks.zh: 挺公平的，怎么就倒霉了。。。。
chunks.en: It's quite fair, how is that unlucky...?

chunks.zh: 😂牛马上线第一天+1
chunks.en: 😂 The first day of being an ox-horse online +1

chunks.zh: 今天就开始上班了？果然牛马😂还是我过得好一些，假都没有。
chunks.en: Starting work today? Indeed, an ox-horse 😂 I'm still better off, not even having a holiday.

chunks.zh: +1 ，主动加班
chunks.en: +1, taking the initiative to work overtime.

chunks.zh: 倒霉蛋+1
chunks.en: Unlucky folk +1

chunks.zh: 昨天已经上了 😂
chunks.en: Already started yesterday 😂

chunks.zh: 可怜呀，这么短的假期
chunks.en: Pitiful, such a short holiday

chunks.zh: +1 ，很多同事还没来，昨天开车来堵死我了，有个同事跟我说今天高铁站票站十几个小时过来
chunks.en: +1, many colleagues haven't arrived yet, I was stuck in traffic yesterday when driving here, one colleague told me they had to stand for more than ten hours with a high-speed rail standing ticket to get here today.

chunks.zh: 说啥呢 俺已经第二天上班了😂
chunks.en: What are you talking about? I'm already on my second day of work 😂

chunks.zh: 就休了除夕一天= =||
chunks.en: Only had one day off for New Year's Eve = =||

chunks.zh: @foxkiller 其他时间 3x 工资也不错了
chunks.en: @foxkiller 3x salary during other times is not bad either.

chunks.zh: 卷天卷地卷到地球爆炸
chunks.en: Compete to the heavens, compete to the earth, compete until the earth explodes.

chunks.zh: 是我
chunks.en: That's me.

chunks.zh: 上班第一天，在工位困成狗
chunks.en: First day of work, feeling as tired as a dog at my work station.

chunks.zh: 昨天就已经上了+1
chunks.en: Already started yesterday +1

chunks.zh: 上班不是一件很快乐的事情么？
chunks.en: Isn't going to work a very happy thing?

chunks.zh: 倒霉蛋还在找工作呢
chunks.en: The unlucky ones are still looking for a job.
